nodes.text: The Jewelry Collection was a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War. It depicted the hands of an individual holding a necklace and comparing it to an image on a datapad.

The Jewelry Collection appeared in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. It was added to the game on November 1, 2007 with the Chapter 7: A Collection of Heroes update, and could be obtained by the player after finishing a small quest chain meant to familiarize them with the newly added "Collections" system, which allowed players to collect various sets of loot or interactive world objects, which would yield a reward when the entire set was collected. The image depicted on the datapad is of the Collections interface window in the game. The painting could only be obtained during the release of Chapter 7. It was no longer available with the release of Chapter 8: The Nova Orion Crisis on January 15, 2008.
